p:
The protein content was estimated by the Bradford method in the brain tissue.
48 The brain homogenate (20 μL) was added to 200 μL of Bradford reagents and incubated for 15 min at 37 °C, and the absorbance was measured at 596 nm in a microplate reader (Spark 10M, Tecan Group Ltd., Switzerland). Bovine serum albumin was taken as the standard (0.1–1 mg). The protein content in the brain homogenate was expressed in mg/μ.
